name: resetBytes(in:)
desc: Replaces the contents of the data buffer with zeros for the provided range.Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func resetBytes<R>(in: R)
items.desc: Replaces the contents of the data buffer with zeros for the provided range.

declaration: mutating func resetBytes<R>(in range: R) where R : RangeExpression, Self.Index == R.Bound
